channel.title: Authors on Abbas Rizvi
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Abbas Rizvi

item.description: Abbas is a PhD data scientist, computational biologist, and educator. Abbas has strong experience doing data science end-to-end. He has domain experience in several industries and topics including molecular/cell biology, pharmaceutical sciences, genomics/ bionformatics, business, and technology. Abbas is highly skilled with the R programming language and given talks at Bioconductor and useR on his open source contributions.
